message:
Had in-depth discussions with a delegation of Ulemas, intellectuals & academicians from the Muslim community. We exchanged views on Swachh Bharat Mission, foreign policy, education, skill development and the need to fight corruption & black money, 

Spoke about how the great culture, traditions & social fabric of India will always stand as a bulwark against radicalisation among youth. http://nm-4.com/md3z
